characters.name: Kyouka Uzen
characters.description:
__Species:__ Human
__Height:__ 167 cm (5'6")
__Peach Ability:__ Chains of Eternity, "Slave"
__Affiliation:__ Anti-Demon Corps (7th Unit Chief)

Kyouka is the chief of the 7th Unit of the Anti-demon Corps, an elite group of women who have received power from the Peaches. She is Yuuki Wakura's savior and becomes his master after she decided to make him her slave. She is a fierce militaristic, calm, and serious woman befitting the 7th Unit Chief. She often fights against the Shuuki more seriously than other chiefs. She cares for the people around her to the point where she will do anything to protect them.

characters.name: Yuuki Wakura
characters.description:
__Species:__ Human
__Height:__ 173 cm (5'8")
__Occupation:__ Caretaker
__Affiliation:__ Anti-Demon Corps (7th Unit)
__Family:__ [Aoba Wakura](https://anilist.co/character/170333/Aoba-Wakura) (sister)

Caretaker of the Anti-Demon Corps 7th Unit. He attended Kaminoge High School as a third-year student but after getting caught up in a Mato Disaster, he was rescued by Kyouka Uzen and became her Slave, granting him the power to fight alongside her.

Due to being a male, he could not become an official member of the Demon Corps since men can't receive special powers after consuming Peaches and has instead became the caretaker of the 7th unit, lending his support to his comrades both in and out of combat.
